title: So, what's the state of the server?
body:
Hiya. Just making a quick inquiry on how the server is in terms of load or generally how it's been for the last hour. Since the first two ranked games of the day were fine, perfect. No lag whatsoever.

...Then my third game, had THIS. https://www.dropbox.com/s/ngkt966sclgaaeo/FIXRIOT.png?dl=0

And before you ask, no, it wasn't the problem on my end. My connection was fine for the first two games. Even running connection tests and uploading that link worked perfectly. One of my team-mates dropped because of similar connection issues.

So, yes, I kind of would like an answer as to the state of the server for the last hour, if at all possible. Sorry for taking up your time.

replies.body:
Ah, well it's only really started to get this severe from what I can tell. Guess I'll have to wait until it's a bit more stable before I finish the rest of my placement games, then. XD

Thanks.

A little hotfix was pushed out this morning. Are you still getting the spikes/disconnections?

PS: You should use "Reply" to reply to someone's message. This isn't the forums anymore.
Well, I suppose I'll find out soon. And sorry about that, I've never actually used these message boards before, so I'm still getting the hang of it. >.<
Nope. Still the same result, 12K ping, disconnect, have to restart the entire program.

...And no better today either. Riot. Please. Fix. Your Servers. It's not my internet, since it goes 6.20 Mbps.

And you know something is wrong when you can upload screenshots of 12K ping in League on Dropbox in seconds yet waiting for it go down. In 30 minutes, it doesn't go below 10K ping. 

In a bot match.

I dunno. I'm not getting any lag at all.

Say, what ISP are you with?

Well, this is six hours late, but I'd say that the servers aren't performing at their best. For weeks now people have been getting lag spikes when they shouldn't have and others being completely disconnected from games for no reason.

So yes, I'd say the servers are unhealthy at the moment.
